Promotion.PromotionDescription: It is an unpaid account with no checkbook addressed to natural persons of legal age and residing in the country who wish to maintain funds in foreign currency in a licit manner.
Promotion.PromotionSubDescription: In accordance with the Exchange Agreement No. 20 entered into between the National Executive and the Bank Central de Venezuela (BCV) and Resolutions No. 12-09-01 and No. 13-03-01 issued by the BCV.

PromotionDetails1.Item1: Account does not pay that it does not issue a checkbook.
PromotionDetails1.Item3: Emission of account statement at the request of the client.

Promotion.PromotionDescription: The description of the promotion must be completed in this section.
Promotion.PromotionSubDescription: The Characteristics of the promotion must be completed in this section.

PromotionDetails1.Item1: Promotion details could be added here.
PromotionDetails1.Item2: Promotion details could be added here.

Promotion.PromotionTitle: Your purchases can go for free
Promotion.PromotionDescription: Request that they pass your Banesco credit or debit card or a credit card from any other bank through the Banesco Point of Sale, and your purchase can be free.
Promotion.PromotionSubDescription: It is very important that you check your ticket to see if you are one of the winners, the ticket must say FREE BANESCO PAYS FOR YOU.
